org.treetank.page

Class IndirectPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.page.IndirectPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPage, IReferencePage

    public final class IndirectPage
extends Object
implements IReferencePage

    IndirectPage

    Indirect page holds a set of references to build a reference tree.

    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz, Marc Kramis, University of Konstanz
